title: Safe handling of food in quantity
creator_credit: Richard Turner and New York State College of Home Economics
brief_description: Discusses food poisoning and measures to prevent it for those employed in handling food. Demonstrates control of bacteria by avoiding contamination, temperature regulation and chemical methods.
